casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Waverly Orlando Harshaw, Jr. No. 337P00-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Waverly Orlando Harshaw, Jr., for Harshaw, Waverly Orlando, Jr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, David Learner, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 24th of October 2016 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Catawba County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Edmunds, J. recused

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of October 2016 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Edmunds, J. recused

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of October 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."

Edmunds, J. recused
